prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Korean. 

Please PRESERVE ALL the original timestamps for EACH ENTRY.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:03,599",
    "end": "00:00:03,880",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "哇"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:03,960",
    "end": "00:00:04,820",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "外面狗好幸福"
  }
]

ONLY and ALWAYS return a valid JSON back:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "ko": "Korean text"
  }
]
```

response.ko: 밖에 있는 개가 정말 행복해 보여
